Description:
Triple Storey living in Officer
AGENT ONSITE: Under Construction (see open times)
Offering a nearly completed townhouse. Located in the popular Parkview Terraces development in the fast growing suburb of Officer.
Featuring a triple storey floorplan, this architecturally designed home is spacious and comes complete with an attractive list of turnkey inclusions.
- Walk to Lakeside shopping centre
- Walk to Cardinia Rd Train Station
- Quick and easy access to major roads
- Close proximity to primary and secondary schools
- Considerable stamp duty savings for owner occupiers
- 6 Star Energy Rating
$10,000 first home owner grant applies.
*Inspections - There will not be a home to inspect internally, however there will be an agent on site to show you around the development.
Not to be missed! Enquire to find out more information.

Description:
Titled Land in Timbertop Estate!
Situated in the emulous Northside, Timbertop Estate is an exclusive 700sqm flat, block of land with a 6m crossover suitable for a triple car garage. With a plethora of potential, you can build your dream home and have enough room for a generous backyard and even a pool! The savvy investor can build and achieve an exceptional investment. Prime positioning, impressive block size, and an astute measure for anyone wanting to enter the property market!
Close proximity to Beaconsfield Town, Berwick Village, Fountain Gate shopping centre, prestigious schools, D'Angelos Winery, public transport, freeway access, sports and medical facilities.
Enquire today and secure your future!

Description:
TIME'S RUNNING OUT
If you are looking for a generous block of land to build your new home, but just cant find the one - then look no further than 14 Burgess Avenue. Situated within The Rise estate on the northside of Officer, this fantastic 595m block represents a perfect opportunity.Featuring a generous 17m frontage and 35m depth, this is the ideal opportunity to build your dream family home with enough room for the entire family and a backyard! With most blocks in the area already built on or under construction, youd better act quickly to secure this block and make yourself a part of the neighbourhood! The location certainly has everything you could possibly need a short distance to St Brigids Catholic Primary School, Officer Primary School & Secondary School, Maranatha, St Francis Xavier, Arena Shopping Centre, Beaconsfield Shopping Village, Monash Freeway and Princes Highway and so much more. Dont miss out snap up this opportunity while you still can!

Description:
Silver Linings In Arena!
From the moment you step through the front door you are greeted with a light-filled, welcoming presence and an enticing taste of what this refreshing 4 bedroom, plus study home has to offer.
Situated in the popular Arena Estate on a 512sqm parcel this opulent designed floorplan is sure to please, offering a master suite complete with WIR containing ample storage and well appointed ensuite. 3 further bedrooms all feature BIRs and are serviced by the main central bathroom. A family lounge overlooking an open-plan living area offers extra space to please the entire family. The superb kitchen overlooks a courtyard with its vine covered arbour reminiscent of a Tuscan scene which is the heart of the home, with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop and extensive cabinetry to inspire the inner master chef. Entertaining flows from inside to out, a large decked area with built in BBQ is ideal for family gatherings, complemented with a generous size grassed yard perfect for kids to play.
Additional features include gas ducted heating and split system heating/cooling, solar hot water with instantaneous gas backup, ceiling fans with remote in all bedrooms and double garage with internal access. Desirably located within close proximity to Monash Freeway, Cardinia train station, Arena Shopping Centre, esteemed schools and Lakeside precinct this delightful home will not last long!
Insights: 11 Silverleaf Crescent, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Be Wowed in Acacia, Officer
Phone enquiry code for this property: 7830
PERFECT LOCATION
OUTSTANDING FINISH
STUNNING DECKING
This immaculately built home leaves nothing to be desired. Located within the prestigious Acacia Estate in Officer, the location is truly exceptional. Less than 1000 meters from the Officer Club, Cardinia Rd Train Station, supermarkets, early learning centres, primary/high schools, dentists, audiologists, pathologists, Medical Centre, Plus Fitness 24/7 and an array of cafes and restaurants. You simply cannot beat the surrounding amenities all within walking distance.
Ideal for first home buyers or investors, it comprises an extensive features set including:
- Master with walk in robe, ensuite with over sized shower, heat lamps and separate toilet
- Remaining 2 bedrooms with built in robes
- Gorgeous natural Merbau wood deck with stunning feature wall
- Open plan kitchen, dining and living area
- Kitchen comprising of 900ml stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher, plenty of cupboard and bench space all overlooking the living area
- Ducted heating and split system cooling
- Down lights throughout kitchen, living and dining area
- Oversized double lockup garage
- Security lock side gate for peace of mind
- Fibre to the premises NBN connection ready
- Solar Hot Water System
- Low maintenance landscaped garden and the list goes on
With land prices ever rising in Officer and not much on offer, this opportunity is not to be missed. Less than a 2-minute drive to the M1 freeway and Princes Highway, enjoy the very best in seamless indoor-outdoor living on offer.
Phone enquiry code for this property: 7830

Description:
BEAUTY ON BRIDGE!!
Looking for that first home or investment property with little or no maintenance? Stop looking, you have found it. Facing out to Bridge Road is this fantastic two bedroom unit, Main bedroom with built in robe, second bedroom with robe plus access to the courtyard. Bathroom is complete with shower, bath and toilet. Open plan kitchen, dining area and lounge area. Kitchen has electric oven, sink and hotplates. Sliding doors open out to the entertaining area and lead to the single garage with built in storage. Completely brand new, this neat compact home is ready for the lucky owner!!

Description:
Stunning Home in The Rise
Commanding a striking street presence, you will be instantly drawn to this stunning Rawdon Hill home. Stepping through the doorway you are greeted with an expansive hallway with flowing floorboards that leads you through the well thought out floorplan. The master bedroom is located at the front of the home and is complete with fitted out walk in robe and full ensuite. A second generous sized bedroom is located to the right of the home whilst you will find the lounge room to the left. Nearing the end of the hallway a clever design allows for a study nook before opening out to the light filled open plan living and dining area. Over looking the open plan living is a gorgeous kitchen that the most discerning of Chef’s would enjoy including two tone kitchen 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops and butlers pantry. Two further bedrooms both have built in robes and share a central bathroom. Enjoy the benefits of a brand new home with 7 years building warranty or if you’re an investor a full depreciation schedule is a must. Located in the thriving Rise Estate and with all the modern conveniences one could wish for including ducted heating, double lock up garage and split system this home won’t last long.
** Grass has been edited into the facade image. Full landscaping of Front and Back yard is due to be completed July 9th weather permitting***
Insights: 7 Mistover Grove, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Investment or Family Home- CANCELLED OPEN FOR SATURDAY 25.08.2018
Presented for sale for the first time this striking four bedroom home is sure to impress. Conveniently located in the popular Arcadia Estate in officer this home has everything on offer .
Upon entry be greeted by the long sweeping hallway giving the feeling of space and luxury throughout.
The master bedroom is conveniently positioned to the front of the home and comprises a full ensuite and walk in robe. A second bathroom and three additional bedrooms are also on offer and located to the rear.
The fully appointed kitchen featuring stone bench top, dishwasher and quality stainless steel appliances is the central hub of the home and overlooks the open plan meals and family room which leads out to the undercover alfresco .
With separate formal living and the added bonus of a second outdoor entertaining area you will have enough space for everyone.
Additional features include gas ducted heating, split system A/C, double garage with remote and internal access, this home simply wont last !

Description:
THE LUXE BY METRICON HOMES
First impressions are lasting impressions, you will fall in love with 46 Tara Boulevard with a modern facade, this BRAND NEW magnificent 4 bedroom home has just been completed by Metricon Homes and features an impressive entertaining area combining internal and external living with an abundance of natural light.
The open plan kitchen includes Caesarstone island benchtops, stainless steel appliances, tiled splashback, walk in pantry and plenty of cupboard space.
The master suite boasts full ensuite and WIR. Bedrooms two, three and four include BIR’s and are serviced by a large bathroom which includes separate bath and shower, stone vanity tops and quality finishes. You will have a choice of a living/dining area or separate rumpus room to relax in. Entertainers will enjoy indoor/outdoor living with sliding door access to undercover alfresco area and professionally landscaped gardens.
Added features include but not limited to remote control double garage, ducted heating, alarm system, blinds, high ceilings, double glazed windows and large laundry!
This modern home is a polished package that includes all the upgrades you’d wish for in other homes. SAVE YOURSELF THE HASSLE OF BUILDING AND MOVE STRAIGHT INTO A COMPLETED BRAND NEW HOME!
Nestled in a most sought after Savannah estate location. Close to parklands, top Primary and Secondary schools and Beaconsfield shopping centre. A unique home built to the highest standard!
This property will suit first home buyers, second home buyers, investors and down sizers. For enquires of this exceptional property always contact Liza Hickey on
0481 185 038 or see us at our open for inspections.

Description:
Rare find - titled block in Arcadia! Buy today, build tomorrow!
If you're ready to move into a community that perfectly balances natural surroundings with all the convenience of urban living, then Welcome to Arcadia, the heart of Officer.
Satterley understand that home is where the heart is, which is why everything has been carefully considered in developing the master plan that creates Arcadia.
Planned to be perfect, everything you need and more!
• 422 m2 flat block of land
• 16.21 frontage
• Dandenong Employment Precinct less than 20 km away
• Easy access to the Princes Highway
• Walking distance to Officer train station
• Surrounded by some of the best primary and secondary schools in the SouthEast and opposite to Officer Secondary College and Officer Specialist School
• Future Officer Town Centre only minutes away
• Close to the Cardinia Road shopping centre
• 25 hectares of dedicated open spaces and park lands
Contact Viraj Peris on 0418 523 165 for more information

Description:
Where Style and Location meet Convenience.
This brand-new split-level townhouse offers convenience and a low maintenance lifestyle! The large open plan living area perfect for entertaining, with a stunning kitchen including a large Caesar stone island benchtop, Westinghouse cooking appliances, Smeg dishwasher and generous cupboard space including double pantry. A study located directly off the family area could easily be used for a tv or kids play room.
Full height North facing doors open to tiled terrace that floods the living area with natural light. The generous master bedroom is located upstairs features a walk in robe and ensuite. Downstairs the two remaining bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom are fitted with double wardrobes. Additional features include LED downlights throughout, powder room, full sized laundry, ample storage, double remote control garage with internal entry, split system air-conditioning and electric heating. This property is a must see for first home buyers, downsizers or the astute investor!

Description:
Stylish Living in Arena!
If you have style and class and want to be situated in one of Officer’s most highly sort after Estate’s, then this stylish townhouse in Arena is for you! Externally and internally this property has endless features that will both capture the eye and allow for maximum comfort with minimal maintenance.
The home offers three bedrooms, the master with walk in wardrobe and ensuite, central bathroom upstairs, powder room downstairs, two separate living areas, open plan dining area that is light filled and flows to a magnificent kitchen with waterfall stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher.
Entertaining is a breeze with a private decked outdoor area. The property backs onto parkland, meaning no rear neighbours and direct access to a peaceful open area perfect for walking your dog or playing with the children. Who needs a backyard!
Other features include split system air conditioner, electric panel heating (radiant heat), down lights throughout, and double lock up garage with internal access.
All this is all available within close proximity to shops, schools and transport. Look no further than 24 Manna Row, Officer!

Description:
10 months old
Having trouble finding your home that ticks all the boxes for residential requirements? Look no further… we have the perfect property that you will need to add to your inspection list.
This stylish, comfortable and quality home boasts just over 26 squares of well-designed living space. The entry of the home is wide and grand, complimented with hardwood timber flooring, a nifty inbuilt shoe cupboard and high ceilings to give you that luxury feel the moment you step through the door.
Features of this home include:
- 4 big bedrooms with carpet to add warmth and mirrored wardrobe doors. Walk in robe to the master bedroom.
- 2 bathrooms with quality fixtures and fittings
- A must have study nook with a stylish inbuilt library
- An amazing designed laundry with maximum cupboard space and storage
- 2 car garage with remote, plus internal access to the home and backyard
Furthermore, the stunning designer kitchen comes with stone bench tops, stainless steel dishwasher and oven with cook top and range hood, plus a butler's pantry for extra storage – great for entertaining the family and guests.
Positioned on 416 square metres of land approximately, with great outdoor entertaining and minimal landscaping, double glazed windows, ducted heating and split system cooling, you will feel right at home in this fantastic property.
This home will suit first home buyers, investors or those seeking for peace and quiet in this young and growing estate in Officer.
Please call for more information or to book an inspection today!

Top Block in Timbertop
Sensationally situated in the finest estate in Officer, this 823sqm marvel of a block is up for grabs and ready to have a dream home built on. With a 22m frontage, this block oozes potential to create and customise the next 10 – 15 years of your life.

Description:
THE ONE YOU HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR!
- Located in one of Officer's premium estates.
- 330m2 block 3 bedroom plus study home with all the trimmings.
- Low Maintenance lifestyle with large rear yard.
- Three beds plus study.
- 900 mm appliances with stone bench-tops throughout.
- North facing rear yard.
Situated in the newly developed Officer Estate, this brand new home is offered for the first time for sale.
A quick drive onto the Princes Freeway, this property has everything you need for first home buyers, investors and downsizes alike.
Terrific living space with full kitchen, including 900 mm stainless appliances, island bench-top, full dishwasher and ample storage.
You will enjoy Gas-ducted heating, stylish tiles in the traffic zones, carpet to all bedrooms, double remote garage and split system air conditioning unit.
Large rear yard for the kids to play and outdoor entertaining, this is a position perfect home, move in or rent out we are priced to sell.
Please contact us for an inspection.

Description:
Metricon 29.1 Luxury Family Home on 553 Sq m Corner Block
This perfectly positioned Luxury Metricon 29.1 sq.family home,set in the Exquisite Park Central Estate is bound to impress anyone. Situated near various amenities such as the Officer train station,Shopping Centre, well sought after schools and access to the M1 Freeway.
This 4-bedroom family home will leave you in awe, only 2 years young, build on 553sqm corner block of land,which is hard to find these day, home will suit those looking for a contemporary and family ‘Home Sweet Home’ in family friendly most sought-after neighborhood with ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
You will be blown by the amenities this residence has to offer,such as the soaring ceilings,4 large bedrooms,master bedroom featuring an exceptionally large walk-in-robe and ensuite,other 3 large bedrooms have mirror built in robes with quality carpet.
butler’s kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, which includes 900mm gas cook top and oven, dishwasher and with large walk in pantry with second dish washing sink.
Property has been updated with hard wood timber polished timber floors.
North and east facing area of property has double glazed window to minimize the utility bills,with very large rumpus room and outdoor alfresco area.
There are so many other features this property has to mention, but not enough space to write so come along and inspect this beautifully presented family home this Thursday from 6:30pm to 7pm and Saturday from 12:30 pm to 1:00pm.
For further information please call 03 8768 8255
*Please Note* - Blue Sapphire Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number.
Photo ID is required upon entering the property.
